errors.SWAG_PAYPAL_POS__EXISTING_POS_ACCOUNT: This Zettle account has already been configured in another Sales Channel

salesChannelDetailDescription.title: Grow your business with Shopware and Zettle by PayPal

disclaimer.headline: Zettle is a PayPal service
disclaimer.subheadline: Help increase sales through the power of PayPal. Get started for free.

status.disabled: Synchronisation is not enabled, because your Sales Channel is disabled.

message.aborted: Last synchronisation was aborted by the user

status.syncingDetail: This could take a few minutes. This process runs in the background, meanwhile you can use your shop as usual.

content.headline: Setup product synchronisation
content.firstLine: Your Zettle and Shopware accounts are now connected! You may now setup product synchronisation.
content.secondLine: Once activated, Zettle will automatically be kept in sync with your Shopware products. Sales made through Zettle are also synchronised with Shopware and you can use the Administration to keep yourself up to date on Zettle and Shopware sales as well.

emptyState.title: No products selected
emptyState.message: There are no products in your Sales Channel or dynamic product group.

settings.domainHelpText: Zettle will use this domain to download media associated with your synchronised products. Zettle will only accept secure URLs (https).
settings.activeHelpText: If active, the Zettle synchronisation will happen automatically in the background.
settings.saveAlert: Saved changes are available after the currently running synchronisation between Shopware and Zettle ended.

reset.descriptionText: If you are experiencing issues, you may re-upload all products and images.
reset.modalConfirmText: This will reset the synchronisation history for the Sales Channel
reset.modalTextInfo: All items will be re-uploaded on the next synchronisation. This may take a while. You will not lose any data in Shopware, some data may be overwritten at Zettle.

runs.title: Synchronisation history
runs.toolbarText: "Clean up logs" will delete all logs. Logs older than 30 days will be removed automatically.

connectionSuccess.headline: Your Zettle and Shopware accounts are now connected!
connectionSuccess.info: Follow the next steps to finish setting up product synchronisation.
connectionSuccess.disclaimer: Any changes you make to your Shopware products will now automatically be updated in your connected Zettle account.

connectionDisconnect.headline: You are about to disconnect Zettle
connectionDisconnect.info: Products will no longer be updated and synchronised with your shown Zettle account when disconnecting your account.

customization.subtitle: Zettle will use this domain to download media associated with your synchronised products.

productSelection.modalTitle: Transfer products from existing Sales Channel
productSelection.info: To get started quicker you now have the option to assign products from an existing Sales Channel to your newly created one. All assigned products will then be available for synchronisation in Zettle POS. No manual work needed.

syncLibrary.shopwareProducts: no Shopware products | one Shopware product | {n} Shopware products
syncLibrary.posProducts: no Zettle products | one Zettle product | {n} Zettle products
syncLibrary.description: All products are synchronised from your newly created Sales Channel in Shopware. How would you like to setup your Zettle library?
syncLibrary.optionReplacePermanentlyDescription: Only your Shopware products and stock quantities will exist in your Zettle library.
syncLibrary.optionReplaceOneTimeDescription: Replace your existing Zettle library with products and stock quantities from Shopware once.
syncLibrary.optionReplaceNotDescription: Your Shopware products and stock quantities will be added to your existing Zettle library.
syncLibrary.disclaimer: You can change these settings later at any time.

syncPrices.header: How would you like to synchronise product prices with Zettle?
syncPrices.description: Your products’ prices will include VAT when synchronised to Zettle.
syncPrices.disclaimer: You can edit your VAT manually in the Zettle product library.
syncPrices.optionTrueDescription: Prices synchronised to Zettle will include VAT.
syncPrices.optionFalseDescription: Product prices will not be transferred on synchronisation. You can set them in your Zettle product library.

finish.firstParagraph: Your Zettle account is now linked to your Sales Channel and your products will be transferred to Zettle. In the future, when you make a sale, we will update your stock in Zettle and Shopware.
finish.secondParagraph: If you need to update your products, we recommend you do this in Shopware and they'll synchronise to your Zettle app automatically.

authentication.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated
authentication.messageDuplicateError: This Zettle account has already been configured in another Sales Channel
authentication.apiKeyDescription: API keys function like passwords. Shopware will use your Zettle API key to establish a secure connection to your Zettle account.

account.errorEmail: Your API key could not be verified

gettingStarted.cardTitle: Get started with Zettle by PayPal
gettingStarted.readerHeadline: Login to Zettle to order your Zettle card reader
gettingStarted.readerText: Learn more about the card reader and order one right here:
gettingStarted.appText:
Available for iOS and Android tablets and phones.
Connect your Zettle account and your card reader to start making sales.

swag-paypal-pos.messageCloneError: Could not transfer product visibility from another Sales Channel.
swag-paypal-pos.messageWebhookRegisterError: The webhook could not be registered at Zettle
